page.title: 01GAZETEER OF IRVINE (SW)
page.content:
This "block" or 4Km x 3Km rectangle is an area to the southwest of Irvine town centre.(Irvine is a town in the Ayr Division of Strathclyde).This area is comprised of a mixture of residential,industrial and coastal.
{FEATURES} 1 Beach park and trim track. 2 Bogside mudflats. 3 District council offices. 4 Discos pubs and inns. 5 Harbour-Arts Centre. 6 Harbour (industrial & pleasure) 7 Indoor shopping centre. 8 Industrial estates with factories. 9 Leisure Centre and theatre. 10 Maritime museum. 11 Railway station and goods yard. 12 Rivers Irvine and Garnock. 13 Re-development areas. 14 Residential areas.
